Class ManagerController

java.lang.Object
controllers.ManagerController
public class ManagerController extends Object
Controller for handling all actions available to a Manager user.

This includes functionality for:

  • Viewing and managing projects assigned to the manager
  • Managing officer registrations for projects
  • Accessing project-related enquiries

  • Constructor Details

    • ManagerController

      public ManagerController()
      Initializes a new instance of the ManagerController. This constructor sets up the necessary services and controllers for handling manager-related operations, such as managing projects, officer registrations, and enquiries.

  • Method Details

    • viewHandledProjects

      public void viewHandledProjects(Manager manager)
      Displays all projects handled by a given manager and lets them manage selected projects.

      For each selected project, the manager can:

      • Manage officer registrations
      • View and manage enquiries
      • Access other project management features
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager whose projects are to be displayed and managed

    • manageProjectOfficerRegistration

      public void manageProjectOfficerRegistration(Project project, Manager manager)
      Allows a manager to manage officer registrations for a specific project.

      Includes:

      • Viewing pending and all registrations
      • Approving or rejecting officer registration requests
      Parameters:
      project - the project for which officer registrations are managed
      manager - the manager approving or rejecting registrations

    • manageApplicantApplications

      public void manageApplicantApplications(Project project, Manager manager)
      Allows a manager to view and manage all applications for a specific project. The manager can approve or reject applications, and handle withdrawal requests.
      Parameters:
      project - The project whose applications are being managed.
      manager - The manager performing the action.

    • createProject

      public void createProject(Manager manager)
      Allows a manager to create a new housing project.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager responsible for the new project.

    • editProjectDetails

      public void editProjectDetails(Project project, Manager manager)
      Allows a manager to edit the details of a selected project, such as name, location, application dates, officer slots, and visibility.
      Parameters:
      project - The project being edited.
      manager - The manager performing the edit.

    • deleteProject

      public boolean deleteProject(Project project, Manager manager)
      Deletes a specified project after confirming the manager's intent.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to be deleted.
      manager - The manager requesting the deletion.
      Returns:
      true if the project was successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • viewAllProjects

      public void viewAllProjects()
      Displays a list of all projects in the system and allows the manager to view individual project details.

    • viewAllEnquiries

      public void viewAllEnquiries(Manager manager)
      Displays all enquiries submitted for any project and allows the manager to respond to pending enquiries.
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager viewing and replying to enquiries.

    • generateReport

      public void generateReport(Project project, Manager manager)
      Generates a report of all booked applications for a given project. The manager can apply filters and choose to export the report as a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      project - The project for which the report is being generated.
      manager - The manager requesting the report.
